chapter.title: Non-Goals
chapter.para: SOAP Encoding Support Use of the SOAP encoding is essentially deprecated in the web services community, e.g., the WS-I Basic Profile excludes SOAP encoding. Instead, literal usage is preferred, either in the RPC or document style.
Support for Java versions prior to J2SE 1.5 JAX-RPC 2.0 relies on many of the Java language features added in J2SE 1.5. It is not a goal to support JBossWS on Java versions prior to J2SE 1.5.
Service Registration and Discovery It is not a goal of JBossWS to support registration and discovery of services via UDDI or ebXML RR. This capability is provided independently by JAXR.
